thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 30 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CEFC Anhui Int'l To Swing To Net Loss In Q1, Controlling Shareholder Pending Major Plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CEFC Anhui Int'l To Swing To Net Loss In Q1, Controlling Shareholder Pending Major Plan

organizations.name: cefc anhui international holding co ltd

text:
March 30 (Reuters) - CEFC Anhui International Holding Co LTD :
* SAYS IT SEES Q1 NET LOSS AT 0-40 MILLION YUAN ($0-6.38 million) FROM NET PROFIT OF 115.76 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER’S MAJOR PLAN MAY LEAD TO CHANGES IN COMPANY’S CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDING
* SAYS COMPANY'S SHARE TRADE REMAINS SUSPENDED Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2GFnIPE ; bit.ly/2E6Hz4L Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2736 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
